title: Dragon's First Virgin
description: Sabrina is on an expedition in Columbia, scouting for coffee plantations as a part of her job. On her day off, her and her boss Roger go on a site seeing tour of the country side, visiting old ruins throughout the rural territory. Sabrina falls down an ancient pit, tumbling and landing into a abandoned cavern below. What she finds next will shock her and unleash her wildest fantasies and desires.  This is a 3,700 word hardcore erotic novel. It includes- Mind control, anal, oral, cream pies and more!
author: Whitney Fox
